title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
2 point is earned for expression for L(t)

1 point is earned for L(t) = 0.5

1 point is earned for the answer

L(t)=A(30)+A'(30) ⋅ (t-30)

A'(30)=-0.055976

A(30)=0.782928

L(t)=0.5 ⇒ t=35.054
